countries.name: France
countries.funFact: France has one of the highest life expectancies in Europe.

countries.name: Germany
countries.funFact: Germany has a universal multi-payer health care system.

countries.name: Italy
countries.funFact: Italy has the highest number of doctors per capita in Europe.

countries.name: Spain
countries.funFact: Spain has one of the highest rates of organ donation in the world.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.funFact: Sweden has one of the lowest smoking rates in Europe.
